Component.Name: ImportExportTool
Component.description: This is a command-line tool. This tool lets users import and export objects between Corkscrew and SharePoint. You must run this tool on a system that has connectivity to both the Corkscrew Farm and your SharePoint Farm. It must be installed on a system that has at least the SharePoint Foundation installed. It uses .NET Framework 4.6 technology. The app will require connectivity to your Corkscrew_ConfigDB database to function.
